data: Seated comfortably on the broad terrace of Professor Gordon’s palatial mansion, Tom Spencer stared abstractedly at the red disk of the setting sun, reflected in the turgid waters of the pool in the garden beyond the edge of the terrace as he listened to his host recount the fascinating story of the love-life of the vallisneria.
terrace | Professor Gordon’s palatial mansion | red disk | setting sun | turgid waters | pool | garden | edge | vallisneria
